actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that certain State conservation publications shall qualify for second-class mail rates.

summary.text: Provides that a conservation publication published by a State agency which is responsible for management and conservation of fish or wildlife resources shall be considered a publication of a qualified nonprofit organization which qualifies for second-class mail rates. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 3626 (b))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that certain State conservation publications shall qualify for second-class mail rates.
